script.name: !lib.menu.tradebar.trade
script.description: Menu Library: Add a tradebar entry to menu
script.sourceplaintext:
skip if $a.menu $a.menu = create custom menu array gosub sub.CheckPlayerObj gosub sub.ComputeMax
$ship.total = $a.ship -> get total volume in cargo bay $ware.vol = get volume of ware $a.product skip if $a.current $a.current = 0 $ship.free = $a.ship -> get free volume of cargo bay
if not $a.selling do if $a.current > $max $a.current = $max else do if - $a.current > $max $a.current = - $max end
$ret = $a.product skip if $a.current $ret = create menu return value: disabled, id=$ret
$COL.TC = 190 $LEN.STOCK = 80 $LEN.TC = 25 $LEN.VOL = 3 * 7 $COL.VOL = $COL.TC - $LEN.VOL $COL.STOCK = $COL.TC + $LEN.TC
if $a.heading $text.col = array alloc: size=5 $text = create custom menu column string, position=0 length=$COL.VOL right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$a.heading $text.col[0] = $text $text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1102518 $text = create custom menu column string, position=$COL.VOL length=$LEN.VOL right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.col[1] = $text $text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1102519 $text = create custom menu column string, position=$COL.TC length=$LEN.TC right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.col[2] = $text $text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=706 $text = create custom menu column string, position=$COL.STOCK length=$LEN.STOCK right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$text $text.col[3] = $text $text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=9510 $text = create custom menu column string, position=-1 length=60 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.col[4] = $text
add custom menu heading to array $a.menu: title=$text.col end
$text.col = array alloc: size=6 $text = create custom menu column string, position=0 length=$COL.VOL right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$a.product $text.col[0] = $text $text = convert number $ware.vol to string $text = create custom menu column string, position=$COL.VOL length=$LEN.VOL right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.col[1] = $text $ware.tc = get transport class of ware $a.product $text = get short transport class name: class=$ware.tc $text = create custom menu column string, position=$COL.TC length=$LEN.TC right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.col[2] = $text
$station.amt = $a.station -> get amount of ware $a.product in cargo bay $station.max = $a.station -> get max amount of ware $a.product that can be stored in cargo bay if $hasTradeView $percent = ( $station.amt * 100 ) / $station.max else $percent = 0 end $text = create custom menu string progress: width=$LEN.STOCK progress=$percent% $text = create custom menu column string, position=$COL.STOCK length=$LEN.STOCK right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$text $text.col[3] = $text
$text = convert number $station.amt to string $text2 = convert number $station.max to string if $hasTradeView $text = sprintf: fmt=' %s/%s', $text, $text2, null, null, null else $text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=749 end $text = create custom menu column string, position=$COL.STOCK length=$LEN.STOCK right=[FALSE] colour=[MenuColour.Cyan] text=$text $text.col[4] = $text $station.price = $a.station -> get price of ware $a.product if $hasTradeView $text = convert number $station.price to string else $text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=749 end $text = create custom menu column string, position=-1 length=60 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.col[5] = $text
$station.amt = $a.station -> get amount of ware $a.product in cargo bay $ship.amt = $a.ship -> get amount of ware $a.product in cargo bay
if $a.selling $tradebar.min = $a.ship -> get volume of ware $a.product in cargo bay $tradebar.max = $a.ship -> get free volume of cargo bay $tradebar.used = $a.ship -> get total volume in cargo bay $tradebar.used = $tradebar.used - $tradebar.min add sell trade bar to menu: $a.menu, text=$text.col, min=$tradebar.min, max=$tradebar.max, current=$a.current, volume=$ware.vol, used=$tradebar.used, return value=$ret, left text=null, right text=null else $tradebar.min = 0 $tradebar.max = $ship.free $tradebar.used = $ship.total add trade bar to menu: $a.menu, text=$text.col, min=$tradebar.min, max=$tradebar.max, current=$a.current, volume=$ware.vol, used=$tradebar.used, return value=$ret, left text=null, right text=null end
$tradebar.arr = get last item in array: $a.menu
$text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=720
$station.amt = $station.amt - $a.current $ship.amt = $ship.amt + $a.current
if $hasTradeView $text2 = convert number $station.amt to string else $text2 = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=749 end
$tradebar.arr = add menu trade bar text: $tradebar.arr id=[TradeBarText.Left1] text=$text $tradebar.arr = add menu trade bar text: $tradebar.arr id=[TradeBarText.Left2] text=$text2
$text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=721 $text2 = convert number $ship.amt to string
$tradebar.arr = add menu trade bar text: $tradebar.arr id=[TradeBarText.Right1] text=$text $tradebar.arr = add menu trade bar text: $tradebar.arr id=[TradeBarText.Right2] text=$text2
$ship.total = $ship.total + ( $a.current * $ware.vol ) $text = convert number $ship.total to string $ship.baysize = $a.ship -> get cargo bay size $text2 = convert number $ship.baysize to string $text = sprintf: fmt='%s/%s', $text, $text2, null, null, null $tradebar.arr = add menu trade bar text: $tradebar.arr id=[TradeBarText.InfoLeft] text=$text $text = $a.station -> get name $tradebar.arr = add menu trade bar text: $tradebar.arr id=[TradeBarText.InfoRight] text=$text
return $tradebar.arr
sub.CheckPlayerObj: $hasTradeView = [FALSE] if not $a.ship -> get amount of ware Trading System Extension in cargo bay if not [PLAYERSHIP] -> get amount of ware Trading System Extension in cargo bay endsub end end $sector = $a.station -> get sector @ $hasTradeView = [THIS] -> call script plugin.guilds.istradeviewable : Sector=$sector endsub
sub.ComputeMax: gosub sub.CheckPlayerObj
if $hasTradeView if $a.selling $max = $a.station -> get free amount of ware $a.product in cargo bay $ship.max = $a.ship -> get amount of ware $a.product in cargo bay else $ship.max = $a.ship -> get free amount of ware $a.product in cargo bay $max = $a.station -> get amount of ware $a.product in cargo bay end $max = get minimum, $max, $ship.max, null, null, null else if $a.selling $max = $a.ship -> get amount of ware $a.product in cargo bay else $max = $a.ship -> get free amount of ware $a.product in cargo bay end end endsub return null

line.text: get total volume in cargo bay
get free volume of cargo bay

create custom menu column string, position=

create custom menu column string, position=

sval.val: Menu Library: Add a tradebar entry to menu
